participant_1.background:
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.
my parents met at woodstock.
I love making people happy with my music.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay optimistic even when faced with challenges.
i teach at a large school.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.

content.text: Hi there! What was your favorite song when you were a kid?
My favorite song when I was a kid was "Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen. I learned it from my parents, who met at Woodstock.
Oh wow, that's a great song! Do you still like it?
I do, but I also like a lot of other music. I love making people happy with my music, and I've been playing guitar for years.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
You should! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will! I've been thinking about it for a while.
If you do, I'd love to hear you play sometime.
Sure! I'll let you know.
Great! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to write, and I'm single but my writing keeps me busy.
That's great! I love writing too. I'm actually a teacher, and I love helping my students learn to write well.
That's awesome! I'm impressed.
Thanks! I'm really passionate about it.
It sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
I do! I'm lucky that I enjoy most of the things I do.
Me too! I'm always looking for new things to try.
That's great! It's important to keep exploring your interests.
I know, right? I just went to a concert in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
Oh wow! That sounds like a lot of fun.
It was! I got to see some of my favorite bands.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time.
